comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Jeez... four years already? Of course, to Adriana it must feel like the Shawshank Redemption... I wonder what really _is_ behind that big picture by their fireplace... (Congrats, you two!!!) I'm spinning east today; 2-2672 D

comments.body: Congratulations Steve and Adriana. Sorry I can't join your celebratory ride today. Hope it's a good one.

comments.body: Thanks, Greg. We rode up Flag to commemorate yesterday afternoon.
